newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian retail sales rose 1.3 pct in Feb yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Italian retail sales rose 1.3 pct in Feb yr/yr.

text.p: Retail sales of medium and large firms in Italy rose 1.3 percent in February 1997 compared with a year earlier, national statistics institute ISTAT said.
Istat said the retails sales index (1995=100), which registers quantity as well as price trends, stood at 91.1 in February against 89.9 in the same month last year.
In the first two months of the year, retail sales grew 1.4 percent, Istat said.
The February increase was due primarily to a 2.7 percent increase in sales at major distribution centres. Smaller outlets registered a 1.0 percent increase in sales.
The value of food sales rose 1.8 percent in February while non-food sales increase 0.9 percent. -- Rome newsroom +396 678 2501
